summary: Completed comprehensive testing of the Checklists feature nested within projects. All backend API tests passed (13/13). Frontend UI testing verified navigation, CRUD operations, item toggling, progress tracking, and reset functionality. The feature is fully functional.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/checklists - List checklists with project filter
Backend: POST /api/checklists - Create checklist
Backend: GET /api/checklists/{id} - Get single checklist with items
Backend: PUT /api/checklists/{id} - Update checklist name/description
Backend: DELETE /api/checklists/{id} - Delete checklist and items
Backend: POST /api/checklists/{id}/items - Add item to checklist
Backend: POST /api/checklist-items/{id}/toggle - Toggle item completion
Backend: PUT /api/checklist-items/{id} - Update item text
Backend: DELETE /api/checklist-items/{id} - Delete item
Backend: POST /api/checklists/{id}/reset - Reset all items to unchecked
Backend: Progress tracking (completed_items/total_items)
Backend: 404 for non-existent checklist
Backend: 404 for non-existent item
Frontend: Navigate from Projects page to project detail
Frontend: Checklists feature card visible on project detail page
Frontend: Navigate to Checklists page via feature card
Frontend: 'Back to Backyard Garden' link works correctly
Frontend: 'New Checklist' button opens dialog
Frontend: Create checklist dialog shows Project (disabled), Name, Description fields
Frontend: Checklist created successfully with toast notification
Frontend: Checklist card displays name, description, progress bar
Frontend: Items display with checkboxes
Frontend: Toggle item checkbox updates completion status
Frontend: Progress bar updates (0/3 â†’ 1/3 with 33%)
Frontend: Checked items show strikethrough styling
Frontend: Edit checklist button opens dialog
Frontend: Update checklist name works
Frontend: Reset checklist button unchecks all items
Frontend: Reset shows toast 'Checklist reset - all items unchecked'
Frontend: Add Item button visible on each checklist card
Frontend: Delete button visible on checklist card
Frontend: Edit/Delete buttons visible on items (hover state)
critical_code_review_comments: Checklist feature implementation is well-structured with proper project scoping
All interactive elements have appropriate data-testid attributes
Progress tracking correctly calculates completed/total items with percentage
Reset functionality properly unchecks all items in a checklist
Frontend correctly fetches checklists filtered by project_id
seed_data_creation: Created 'Garden Daily Tasks' checklist with 3 items (Water the tomatoes, Check for pests, Harvest ripe vegetables) for Backyard Garden project. Also created 'UI Test Checklist' via UI testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Checklists feature fully tested and working. The feature is nested within projects at route /projects/:projectId/checklists. Key test IDs: add-checklist-btn, feature-card-checklists, checklists-page, item-checkbox-{id}, reset-checklist-{id}, add-item-{id}. Test data exists in Backyard Garden project (ID: 5cea0f68-77e6-462b-8cc6-2128f0f300e1) with 2 checklists. Backend test file at /app/backend/tests/test_checklists.py can be reused for regression testing.
